Movie: Dismal, failed attempt to cash-in on cult-status success of original movie. Unlike the first movie, there's no mystery, tragedy, sense of isolation or cameraderie. This is just a piss-poor 'vampire' movie with a terrible script and a very weak plot. Avoid!

I love how everyone is all "This Movie Sucks, First one was way better"

When actually the first one is more of a "Critical Success" it does not follow the comic well, where this Sequel works with the Dark Days Volume of the comic SO WELL.  

A-10
V-10
M-10
